Lake District Nainital, Place for Tourists Nainital is known as the Lake District of Uttarakhand. It is situated at an altitude of approx. 1900 meters from the sea level. It has some historical importance and finds its name in various ancient legends and myths. Its temple also holds some of the importance for the Hindus. Saying about the climate and weather around the region of Nainital, it is simply awesome with the highest of 27 degree Celsius and the minimum of 10 degree Celsius.Naini Lake is the main reason for the popularity of Nainital as this place was believed to be the tandavva dance place of lord Shiva. Naini peak or the chenni peak is the highest point or stiff way of the mountain.
